Lima Pemilik Lahan di Pangkep Terima Ganti Rugi Lahan Pembangunan Rel KA
06 Nov 2019, 22:21 by Hari Purnomo


Lima Pemilik Lahan di Pangkep Terima Ganti Rugi Lahan Pembangunan Rel KA

KBRN, Pangkep : Proyek pembebasan lahan jalur rel Kereta Api (KA) di Kabupaten Pangkep sudah mulai dilakukan tahap pembayaran ganti rugi. Di kabupaten Pangkep sudah ada  lima bidang lahan yang telah dilakukan pembayaran ganti rugi.Sekretaris Direktorat Jenderal Perkeretaapian    Kementerian Perhubungan, Zulmafendi ketika menyaksikan  pembayaran ganti rugi  di Kantor Camat Marang, Pangkep, tadi siang mengatakan proses perkeretaapian ini harus dipercepat karena tahun depan ditargetkan kereta api Makassar Pare pare susah harus dioperasikan."Bulan Agustus 2020 kereta api  harus sudah dioperasikan, Balai Perkeretaapian Jawa bagian Timur sudah mulai  pembangunan bagian fisik, sehingga semua proses ini harus dipercepat," ungkapnya, Rabu (6/11/2019).Sementara  itu Kepala Kantor Wilayah BPN/ATR Sulsel, Dadang Suhendi mengatakan  di Pangkep sudah ada 95 dari 2 ribu 197 pemilik bidang tanah yang telah setuju, namun secara dokumen baru selesai 5 bidang tanah yang telah rampung.Tekhnis pembayaran ganti rugi dibagi dua langkah, yakni transaksi secara langsung kepada pemilik lahan, dan  pembayaran dititipkan ke Pengadilan secara konsinyasi."Untuk pembayaran ganti rugi ini ada dua yakni langsung ke pemilik lahan dan pembayaran dititipkan di pengadilan, apabila ada keputusan pengadilan ditambah atau dikurangi," ungkapnya.Kelima pemilik bidang tanah tersebut yakni empat bidang tanah di kecamatan Marang   yabkni  H Azikin di Kelurahan Attangsalo seluas 5 ribu 287 meter persegi, dengan nilai ganti rugi 578 juta  rupiah lebih,  Abdullah Laba di Kelurahan Bonto-Bonto seluas seribu 316 meter persegi dengan ganti rugi  101 juta rupiah lebih, H Syariffuddin Dg Nessa kelurahan Bonto-Bonto seluas seribu 933 meter persegi dengan ganti rugi  161 juta rupiah lebih dan H M Yusuf H Kelurahan Ma'rang seluas 298 meter persegi dengan nilai 336 juta rupiah lebih serta Nurhayati dari Kelurahan Minasatene, Kecamatan Minasatene seluas 521 meter persegi dengan nilai ganti rugi 486 juta rupiah lebih. Sehingga dari kelima bidang tanah tersebut nilai ganti rugi lahan mencapai 1,6 milyar rupiah lebih.

Five Land Owners in Pangkep Receive Land compensation for Railroad Development
Nov 6 2019, 22:21 by Hari Purnomo


Five Land Owners in Pangkep Receive Land compensation for Railroad Development

KBRN, Pangkep: The project for land acquisition for the railroad track (KA) in Pangkep Regency has begun to make compensation payments. In Pangkep district there have been five land parcels that have been compensated. The Directorate General of Railways of the Ministry of Transportation, Zulmafendi, when witnessing compensation payments at the Marang Sub-District Office, Pangkep, said this afternoon the railroad process must be accelerated because next year the Makassar railroad is targeted Bitter melon must be difficult to operate. "In August 2020 the train must have been operated, the East Java Railway Station has begun construction of the physical part, so all these processes must be accelerated," he said, Wednesday (11/06/2019). Meanwhile the Head of Office The South Sulawesi BPN / ATR region, Dadang Suhendi, said that in Pangkep 95 of 2 thousand 197 landowners had agreed, but only 5 land parcels had been completed. The technical compensation payments were divided into two steps, namely a direct transaction to land owner, and the payment is deposited in court sec "For the payment of this compensation there are two, namely directly to the land owner and the payment is deposited in court, if there is a court decision added or reduced," he said. The five landowners are four plots of land in Marang sub-district Yabkni H Azikin in the Kelurahan Attangsalo covering an area of 5 thousand 287 square meters, with a compensation value of more than 578 million rupiahs, Abdullah Laba in the Bonto-Bonto village of one thousand 316 square meters with compensation of more than 101 million rupiahs, H Syariffuddin Dg Nessa Bonto-Bonto ward area of one thousand 933 square meters with compensation of more than 161 million rupiah and HM Yusuf H of Ma'rang Village covering an area of 298 square meters with a value of 336 million rupiah more and Nurhayati from Minasatene Village, Minasatene District covering 521 square meters with compensation value of 486 million rupiah more. So from the five parcels of land the value of land compensation reaches 1.6 billion rupiah more.
